cryptborne.name: Cryptborne
cryptborne.description: Top-down dungeon crawler in a medieval fantasy setting - Fight your way through procedurally generated dungeons with unique weapons

about.title: üìñ About the Game
about.paragraph1: Cryptborne is a top-down dungeon crawler set in a medieval fantasy world, developed with Unity 6. Explore procedurally generated dungeons full of enemies and challenges.
about.paragraph2: Fight your way through waves of enemies with different weapons, each offering unique firing patterns and playstyles. The game features fluid character movement, responsive combat mechanics, and modular dungeon layouts that ensure every playthrough is different.

proceduralDungeons.title: Procedurally Generated Dungeons
proceduralDungeons.description: Each game offers new, randomly generated dungeon layouts for endless replayability

weaponVariety.title: Diverse Weapon Systems
weaponVariety.description: Various weapons with unique firing patterns and playstyles

enemyAi.title: Dynamic Enemy AI
enemyAi.description: Intelligent enemies with adaptive behavior and different attack patterns

inventory.title: Weapon Hotbar & Inventory
inventory.description: Intuitive inventory system with quick weapon switching via hotbar

smoothMovement.title: Fluid Character Control
smoothMovement.description: Responsive movement mechanics and precise combat system

medievalAesthetic.title: Medieval Fantasy Aesthetic
medievalAesthetic.description: Coherent visual design with KayKit Assets in charming low-poly style

modularDungeons.title: Modular Dungeons
modularDungeons.description: Each dungeon is procedurally generated from modular rooms. Discover new layouts, traps, and secrets with every playthrough.

weaponVariety.title: Weapon Variety
weaponVariety.description: Different weapons with unique characteristics - from fast daggers to powerful bows with special firing patterns.

combatSystem.title: Combat System
combatSystem.description: Precise control meets dynamic combat. Dodge attacks, position yourself cleverly, and use your weapons' strengths.

lowPolyAesthetic.title: Low-Poly Aesthetic
lowPolyAesthetic.description: Stylish medieval fantasy world in charming low-poly look with coherent art style through KayKit Assets.

sattrack.name: SatTrak
sattrack.description: Interactive 3D satellite visualization with Unity and Cesium - Track over 5000 satellites in real-time on a virtual globe

about.title: üìù About the Project
about.paragraph1: SatTrak is an interactive 3D satellite visualization project developed as part of a university project at FSU Jena. With Unity and Cesium for Unity, it enables real-time tracking of over 5000 active satellites on a virtual globe.
about.paragraph2: The project uses TLE data from CelesTrak and the SGP4 algorithm for precise orbit calculation. Users can switch between a space view and a first-person Earth view, visualize satellite orbits, and display satellite density through a GPU-based heatmap.

realtimeTracking.title: Real-time Satellite Tracking
realtimeTracking.description: Visualization of over 5000 active satellites with TLE data from Celestrak

interactiveCamera.title: Interactive Camera Control
interactiveCamera.description: Seamless transition between space and Earth view with zoom slider

famousSatellites.title: Famous Satellites
famousSatellites.description: Special 3D models for famous satellites like ISS, Hubble Telescope

orbitVisualization.title: Orbit Visualization
orbitVisualization.description: Display of satellite orbits with different colors (up to 9 simultaneously)

heatmap.title: Heatmap Visualization
heatmap.description: GPU-based display of satellite density on Earth's surface

dayNight.title: Day/Night System
dayNight.description: Realistic lighting with dynamic day/night cycle

locationSearch.title: Location Search
locationSearch.description: Quick navigation to over 1000 cities worldwide with GeoNames database

timeControl.title: Time Control
timeControl.description: Time-lapse (0x - 1000x) with time slider and zoom function

performance.title: Performance-optimized
performance.description: GPU instancing and Unity Job System for smooth rendering

team.title: üë• Team
team.description: Developed by Jan Vogt, Yannik K√∂llmann, Leon Erdh√ºtter and Niklas Maximilian Becker-Kl√∂ster

homepage.name: Homepage / Portfolio
homepage.description: A modern portfolio website with an IDE-like interface inspired by VS Code - Built with React, TypeScript and Vite

about.title: üìù About the Project
about.paragraph1: This homepage is a personal portfolio project that offers a unique IDE-like user interface inspired by Visual Studio Code. It combines the aesthetics of a development environment with the functionality of a modern website.
about.paragraph2: The project demonstrates advanced React concepts such as custom routing, state management, and a fully functional tab system. It showcases my skills in frontend development and UI/UX design.

goals.title: üéØ Project Goals
goals.goal1: Create an interactive and engaging portfolio experience
goals.goal2: Demonstrate advanced React and TypeScript concepts
goals.goal3: Build a reusable IDE component library
goals.goal4: Showcase best practices in modern web development

ideInterface.title: IDE-like User Interface
ideInterface.description: VS Code-inspired interface with file explorer, tab system and breadcrumb navigation

tabSystem.title: Tab-based Navigation
tabSystem.description: Fully functional tab system with drag-and-drop, tab persistence and browser history integration

searchEverywhere.title: Search Everywhere
searchEverywhere.description: Global search with fuzzy matching across all pages, features and tech stack elements

customizableKeymaps.title: Customizable Keybindings
customizableKeymaps.description: Fully configurable keymap system with custom shortcuts

dualViewModes.title: Dual View Modes
dualViewModes.description: Switch between modern website and IDE view with separate routing paths

interactiveBackground.title: Interactive Background
interactiveBackground.description: Dynamic particle animation that responds to mouse movement and clicks

breadcrumbNavigation.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
breadcrumbNavigation.description: Smart path display with dropdown navigation through the file structure

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Optimized for desktop, tablet and mobile with Tailwind CSS

githubPages.title: GitHub Pages Deployment
githubPages.description: Automatic deployment with CI/CD and SPA routing support

fileTree.title: Dynamic File Tree
fileTree.description: Automatic page discovery with Vite's import.meta.glob() - new pages are dynamically added to the explorer

routing.title: Hybrid Routing
routing.description: Combination of React Router and custom tab system with browser history integration

persistence.title: State Persistence
persistence.description: Tab state survives page reloads through sessionStorage, view mode is stored in localStorage

search.title: Search Service
search.description: Centralized search service with weighted results and fuzzy matching for optimal search experience

ctexecutor.name: cteXecutor
ctexecutor.description: Execute and manage Common Table Expressions (CTEs) with ease in DataGrip and IntelliJ-based IDEs

cteDetection.title: Automatic CTE Detection
cteDetection.description: Automatically detects all CTEs in your SQL WITH clause and displays them in an interactive popup.

visualHighlighting.title: Visual Highlighting
visualHighlighting.description: Visually highlights selected CTEs in the editor for better overview while working.

smartExecution.title: Smart Execution
smartExecution.description: Executes the selected SQL query directly in the database console with automatic cleanup.

copyClipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard
copyClipboard.description: Quickly copy any CTE query to the clipboard for use elsewhere.

executeFromHere.title: Execute from Here (NEW!)
executeFromHere.description: Execute SQL from anywhere - not just CTEs! Works with any subselect in your SQL.

dependencyResolution.title: Automatic Dependency Resolution
dependencyResolution.description: Automatically includes all required CTEs - detects dependencies in CTEs, subqueries, and SELECT statements.

smartDetection.title: Smart Detection
smartDetection.description: Automatically finds dependencies in CTEs, subqueries, and final SELECT statements.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Lightning-fast workflow with convenient keyboard shortcuts for all important functions.

minimalUi.title: Minimal UI
minimalUi.description: Stays out of the way - doesn't interfere with your work and integrates seamlessly into your IDE.

autoCleanup.title: Automatic Cleanup
autoCleanup.description: Inserted SQL is automatically removed after execution - no manual cleanup needed.

lightweight.title: Lightweight
lightweight.description: No performance impact - the plugin runs efficiently in the background without slowing down the IDE.

executeFromHere.description: Execute from current position with dependencies

editAndRun.description: Edit and execute query (e.g., add WHERE clauses)

support.title: ‚ù§Ô∏è Support
support.intro: If this plugin helps you, I'd appreciate:
